title: Language-Based Targeted Workshop for Strengthening Control Science Digital Literacy Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and high-level application skills, experience in reading specialized texts and writing technical reports
context.additional_context: Strengthening technical communication and interdisciplinary language expression skills in a real-time collaborative learning environment utilizing a quadruple mentoring system (digital literacy/academic/project/corporate mentors).

learning_goals: Enhance digital problem-solving competency based on DIGCOMP 2.2 standards by at least 65%, while strengthening technical text analysis and specialized terminology usage skills.
Solve at least 80% of real-world industrial problems encountered in AI-based control system design and cultivate technical documentation and oral presentation skills.
Write a digital literacy evaluation report applying mixed methodologies (quantitative + qualitative) and acquire academic expression techniques.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
